TextBlock.TextLine: ¶Chaureth.
ciant p̾sentes ⁊c̃ Qd̵ ego Beatrix de Ardñe quondam uxor Wil̃l̃i Ardñe in mea pura uiduitate cõstitu
ta dedi ⁊ concessi ⁊ hac p̾senti carta mea cõfirmam deo ⁊ beate marie ⁊ sancto Ioh̃m Bap̃te ⁊ fr̃ib hospital̃
ieros̃ in puram ⁊ ꝑpetuam elemosinã unam acram t̾re ⁊ una Rod̾a in uilla de Chaur̃ s que iacet iuxͣ t̾ram
p̾dc̃oꝵ hospit̃ in longitudĩe ex una ꝑte ⁊ t̾ram wil̃l̃i Giffard ex alt̾a ꝑte ⁊ unũ capud̃ abuttat suꝑ t̾ram que
uocat᷑ longeyerd uersus orient̃e ⁊ aliud capud uersus occidentẽ suꝑ unam t̾ram que uocat᷑ algoresgore h̃end̃
⁊ tenend̃ p̾dc̃am t̾ram adeo lib̃am sic̃ aliqua elemosina lib̃ius p̃t dari alicui domui religiõis Et ego Beatx̃
⁊ hered̃ mei warantizabimꝰ p̾dc̃am t̾ram cũ ꝑtĩn p̾dc̃is fr̃ib contͣ om̃es hoĩes ⁊ fem̃ias imꝑp̃m Et in huiꝰ
rei ⁊c̃ hiis testib ⁊c̃
Carta dñe Beatricis de Ardene de una acra t̾re
m̃ib xp̃i ⁊c̃ Ego dña Beatrix de Arderñ sal̃tm Sciatis me dedisse ⁊ concessisse ⁊ hac p̾senti carta mea
confirmasse deo ⁊ beate marie ⁊ sc̃o Ioh̃ni Bapt̃e ⁊ beatis pauꝑib domꝰ hospit̃ irl̃m ⁊ frĩb hospit̃ apud
Chaur̃ deo sermentib unã acram t̾re mee in campo qui uocat᷑ Chandeneffeld̃ cũ om̃ib ꝑtĩn iacent̃ int̃
t̾ram meã ⁊ t̾ram Monacoꝵ de Tylec̃ in longitudĩe uñ unũ capud abuttat suꝑ chandonesmor uersus austͣ
lem ꝑtem ⁊ aliud capud suꝑ t̾ram meã uersus domũ Nich̃i fabri uersus aquilon in puram ⁊ ꝑpetuã ele
mosinã adeo pure ⁊ ꝑpetue sic̃ aliqua elemosina domui religiõis dari p̃t Et ego p̾dc̃a Beatrix ⁊ heredes
mei p̾dc̃am t̾ram p̾dc̃is frĩb hospit̃ irl̃m contͣ om̃es ⁊ femĩas de secta curie ⁊ de om̃i Regl̃i seruic̃ imꝑp̃m
warantizabimꝰ Hiis testib ⁊c̃
Carta dñi will̃mi de Arderne de terra m̃ uilla de chaureth
m̃ib xp̃i ⁊c̃ Dñs Will̃s de ardñe sal̃tm in dño Nou̾it ⁊c̃ concessisse ⁊ dedisse ⁊ hac p̾senti carta mea
confirmasse deo ⁊ beate marie ⁊ fr̃ib hospit̃ irl̃m ⁊ domui hospit̃ de Chaur̃ ꝓ salute aĩe mee ⁊ añcessoꝵ me
oꝵ ⁊ successoꝵ in lib̃am ⁊ puram ⁊ ꝑpetuã elemosinã totam t̾ram quam Ioh̃es Pod tenuit de me ⁊ de añ
cessorib meis in uilla de Chaur̃ de feodo meo cũ om̃ib ꝑtĩn ⁊ totũ Ius qd̵ in illo teñ h̃ui uel here potiu ꝓ
me ⁊ hered̃ meis Tenẽd̃ ⁊ h̃end̃ illud tẽn cũ om̃ib ꝑtĩn suis de me ⁊ hered̃ meis p̾dc̃e domui ⁊ frĩb lib̃e
⁊ quiet̃ ab om̃ib secl̃ar̃ seruic̃ consuetudinib ⁊ demand̃ in campis in pͣtis in fossatis in sepib in uiis in semi-
tis ⁊ in pastur̃ ⁊ in om̃ib reb ad illud teñ ꝑtĩn ad cariand̃ ⁊ ad fugand̃ a domo sua de Chaur̃ ultra t̾ram meã
ubicũq eis meliꝰ expedierit ad illud tẽn Et ego p̾dc̃us Will̃s ⁊ hered̃ mei warantizabimꝰ totũ p̾dc̃m tẽn
cũ om̃ib ꝑtĩn p̾dc̃is frĩb imꝑpm̃ sic̃ purã ⁊ ꝑpetuã ⁊ lib̃am elemosinã contͣ om̃es homines ⁊ femi-
nas. Hiis testib ⁊c̃
Carta dñe Beatricis imꝑ ux̃ dñi will̃mi de Ardern militis de t̾ris pratꝭ ⁊c̃ iñ Chaureth̃
ciant p̾sentes ⁊c̃ Quod ego Beatrix Relicta quondmͣ dñi Will̃i de Ardñe militis remisi ⁊ quiete clama-
in priori ⁊ fr̃ib hospit̃ irl̃m in Anglia totũ ius ⁊ clameũ que h̃ui uel h̃ere potui nomĩe dotis in om̃ib
t̾ris pͣtis pascius ⁊ uiis que h̃ui de donoͩ ͨ.ͥW. de Ardñe in uilla siue ꝑochia de Chaur̃ h̃end̃ ⁊ tenend̃ p̾dc̃is
priori ⁊ frĩb ⁊ eoꝵ successorib in liberã ⁊ purã ⁊ ꝑpetuã elemosinã ꝓ ut carta dc̃i Will̃i plenius testat᷑
Et ꝓ hac remissõne quieta clamacõe dederũt mͥ p̾dc̃i prior ⁊ fr̃es decem merc̃ st̾lingoꝵ In cuius rei tes-
timoniũ ego dc̃a Beatx̃ in legia p̃tate ⁊ lib̃a uiduitate mea constituta huic p̾senti scripto sigillũ
meũ apposui Hiis testib ⁊c̃
De capella h̃nda in curia dñi wil̃l̃mi de Arderne infra ꝑochiam de Chaureth.
niu̾sis ⁊c̃ Will̃s de Ardñe sal̃tm in dño Nou̾it ⁊c̃ priorẽ ⁊ fr̃es hospit̃ irl̃m in Anglia de concẽsu
dñi Wil̃l̃i uic̃ eccl̃ie eoꝵ de chaur̃ mͥ ⁊ heredib meis concessisse capll̃am h̃ndam in curia mea in
ꝑochia eccl̃ie eoꝵ p̾dc̃e ad deseruiẽd̃ ꝑ ꝓprios nr̃os capellanos ita .s. qd̵ capll̃ani qͥ successiue ibi mĩstͣturi
